website_summaries.verdict: Unlike traditional strips, this combination of pore strips and blackhead strips boasts a unique oil- absorbing technology to deeply clean out toxins prevent future blackheads.
pros: Works particularly well when left on skin overnight
cons: Some customers found it left their skin slightly red upon removal

customer_reviews.title: FANTASTIC!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tried this once and it is now my 2nd purchase. My daughter has eczema and these are great...they do not irritate her at all. And it does an amazing job cleansing pores. Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Olexas

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are better than the Biore pore strips and they are cheaper. They work well and are easier to use. The strip is thicker and the adhesive is strong enough to pull the junk out of your pores!
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Great value and clean the pores!
customer_reviews.text: You dampen your nose, then apply this dry paper. wait 12 minutes, and slowly tear this paper off... boom.. all blocked pores are clear-witness the residue on the paper (gross). Works just that easily. And there are plenty of them in this packet.
customer_reviews.author: abc

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! So many come in the pack, and omg from left to right, these strips get tons of that gunk out. I know it might look gross, but I just had to show proof. Great product. I always exfoliate beforehand to get a better "grip"
customer_reviews.author: SlyMarei

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For me they work as well as the big name brand ones, at a substantially better price! Wouldn't hesitate to order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.text: Well packaged. Functionally just as good as Biore despite a large price difference. I paid full price for this (not a promotional review) and be will be buying more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Works Great but Strong
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They are strong though. Mine did not get hard like the other typical nost strips. It hurt taking off, brought a little tear but it cleaned out my blackheads so well!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I've never used pore strips before so i have nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never used pore strips before so i have nothing to compare these to, but they seem to work. Gotta lot of little hairs i had no idea about, and my nose is now much cleaner. Didn't really have much for black heads or white heads so I can't say anything about that.
customer_reviews.author: Tegan H

customer_reviews.title: Don't  waste your money
customer_reviews.text: These were the worst strips I have ever bought. They didn't stick on at all!
customer_reviews.author: jessica todd

customer_reviews.title: I have oily skin and use the strips every three days as recommended. Blackheads and extra sebum are removed every time
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this product! Definitely a bargain compare to the Biore strips and I find that the MEDca strips work well. I have oily skin and use the strips every three days as recommended. Blackheads and extra sebum are removed every time. I would not call this a deep cleaning product but it definitely removes excessive oils, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Marie H.

customer_reviews.title: This works perfect.
customer_reviews.text: It worked AWESOME, all 24 came perfectly on the box and i followe the instructions: cleaned my face, dry my hands, wet my nose, place the nose strip, let it dry for 15 min and it worked awesome. The expensive ones haven't worked as good as this one.
customer_reviews.author: Kalya Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great value for my money! Does the work but I wouldn’t consider it super deep cleansing as it works decent on some of the bigger/deeper pores. Would purchase again for the value though.
customer_reviews.author: FNS

customer_reviews.title: Super deep clean
customer_reviews.text: Reaches really deep into your pores to get all the gunk out, even stubborn blackheads don't stand a chance. Out cleans biore strips by a mile. Very strong though, probably not a good idea for people with sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jen R.

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy Again And Again!!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pore strips!! Work better than the black charcoal ones I had bought. Easy directions to follow. Easy application. I read some reviews that had said that it hurt taking it off. I didn't find that to be true. Would buy again. I would also recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle M

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: They dont really work. I have tried other brands that work better. They are to stiff to apply correctly and they leave my wkin sticky.
customer_reviews.author: JESSICA

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Cheap knock off brand is too thick, doesn't contour to skin. Doesn't dry properly, leaving sticky residue on skin and doesn't pull out blackheads. Worst of all, smells VERY strongly of super glue.
customer_reviews.author: Erin G.

customer_reviews.title: considering the prices it's a good product.
customer_reviews.text: the band takes longer to dry than other products and it doesn't clean as much as other products. But, considering the prices it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: María Arce

customer_reviews.title: Better than any other
customer_reviews.text: These are so much better than Bjore or any other I have tried. Seem stickier without needing to be as wet, and feel secure as soon as you put it on. Does a great job
customer_reviews.author: mrandmrskats

customer_reviews.title: they just hurt like a mf while peeling it from the nose
customer_reviews.text: Work really well, they just like a mf while peeling it from the nose.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: These work really well, I use once a week ...
customer_reviews.text: These work really well, I use once a week and it makes a big difference. Can't beat the price when compared to name brand products, either!
customer_reviews.author: Melee

customer_reviews.title: Worked fantastic
customer_reviews.text: These worked just as well as name brand of not better. Very satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Worth your money and more!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like name brand. No smell that I can sense. Will definitely buy them again! Such a great deal!!
customer_reviews.author: robin bansemer

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Too small to fully wrap around my house (male) I followed the instructions and only a few came out.. Oh well it was cheap anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Ha! It's Yvonne Strahovski!
customer_reviews.text: Anyone else notice that the box has a photoshopped version of Yvonne Strahovski? Lol found it on google images. Regardless, these work just as well as any other expensive brand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Biori much better. Does not do what it is supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Biori much better. Does not do what it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Leaves a sticky residue after peeling off the strip. However, fair price for the quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It does what it's supposed to, so no qualms here.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Good value. Strips work well
customer_reviews.text: Good value. Strips work well. Strips are stiffer than more expensive pore strips, but work abut as well. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JOSHUA A

customer_reviews.title: great item for less than name brand
customer_reviews.text: Received these today. I was getting ready to buy the 24 count Biore strips for nearly double the price when I saw these - 24 count for half the price! They worked just as well as Biore, and even took out a couple of more blackheads. I am very happy with the results. I do agree, there is an odor. It kind of reminds me of hair dye. It doesn't really bother me, hence the full five stars. As someone else said - follow the instructions, and you'll likely be happy with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Useless. Nothing like the product it is knocking off. I was really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooksie

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. I purchased it to try a less expensive alternative to biore and I won't make that mistake again
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Weird Smell
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy again weird smell and does not work well!
customer_reviews.author: Test

customer_reviews.title: Very good strips for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very good strips for the price! Work the same way as others of famous brands. I have to use them up to 3 times a week so these one box will be enough for two months! I am completely satisfied and will certainly buy more of this product. As somebody has mentioned about the smell, it is really very strong but not bad, I am not capricious to bear it just for 10-15 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works just like the name brand strips
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the name brand strips! And seriously the quantity for the price is amazing! 24 strips for under $5 is a hell of a deal!
customer_reviews.author: Miller

customer_reviews.title: I love these!
customer_reviews.text: These pore strips work great. They are easily comparable to Biore strips, the one main difference I have found with them is that they don't have the perforation to fit the shape of your nose better, but it's easy to work with it to figure out a way to get into the creases.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: are terrible. You might get ten blackheads if the stars ...
customer_reviews.text: I've used these five times now and my girlfriend tried them as well, the results...are terrible. You might get ten blackheads if the stars align. Not worth the time or money.
customer_reviews.author: John B.

customer_reviews.title: They really work !!
customer_reviews.text: I had heard this product was really good from some of the reviews here. I was unhappy with all the store bought ones i've tried, and these are far better than any of those. It actually works like it says !! It really sticks and takes out all the gunk from my pores, without leaving any residue on my nose. I will be recommending these to all of my friends !! :)
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than the Biore strips and works just as good. This one hurts a little more when taking ...
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper than the Biore strips and works just as good. This one hurts a little more when taking them off, but i personally like that. Makes me think its taking more blackheads off my nose. Arrived quickly and undamaged.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't stick on as well as the brand name (starts with a B) and I would not recommend this! Since it doesn't stick on as well, it doesn't pull as much stuff off. The only reason it doesn't get a 1-star is because it does *sometimes* work.
customer_reviews.author: R. B.

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty disappointing. They're very stiff
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty disappointing. They're very stiff. You have to use extra water to make them flexible enough to mold to your face. And then I find when I pull them off there are only a few areas where you can see the gross stuff from your pores, the rest remains shiny, as if it was never activated and does not adhere to the gunk in your skin. Very disappointing. Stick with the better-known brands.
customer_reviews.author: Your mom

customer_reviews.title: No Box, No instructions
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased this same product in the past, each strip came individually wrapped with instructions on each foil package and were in the manufacturers box. This product came as individually wrapped strips but without a box and without any identifying information on them. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: J. Barrett

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Holy wow. Much cheaper than the typical brand of pore strips I purchase, but these bad boys work. And I really appreciate the amount of pore strips that come within the box!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Black head remover
customer_reviews.text: I just tried this product today. It really works for me. No sore nose and it took a lot of my blackheads out. Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: DJ

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I feel that these work better than the more expensive brand. They seem to get out more black heads and I don’t end up wasting any by adding too much water like others.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke1982

customer_reviews.title: Boo!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your money! Stick with Biore strips. These don’t adhere at all, so they don’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy DeVille

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work. Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesnt work at all. Doesnt stick. Added more water, then it stuck.. When took it off, it didnt pull out anything. Dont buy.
customer_reviews.author: samantha dawson

customer_reviews.title: Biore strips are WAY BETTER.
customer_reviews.text: NOOOO THEY DO NOT WORK. I'm so bummed. Biore strips are WAY BETTER.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: They don't work purchase Biores instead
customer_reviews.text: Worst nose strips I've ever purchased. They don't even remove As many blackheads than Biores strips
customer_reviews.author: Val Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Described
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. Does not get the pores on the top of the nose that great, but the amount of debris removed from the sides makes up for it.
customer_reviews.author: Samalina

customer_reviews.title: Not effective
customer_reviews.text: These strips are less harsh on the skin as other strips. Product came quickly, average instructions. However I did not find them as effective as other strips.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Very worth the money, awesome product and price
customer_reviews.text: THESE ARE GREAT!!! Works good, if not better then the expensive brands. Amazed!!! Must buy
customer_reviews.author: BRIT HAMNER

customer_reviews.title: They don't conform to your face as well as the ...
customer_reviews.text: They don't conform to your face as well as the Biore, and so don't work quite as well. But they're ok
customer_reviews.author: Lynette M

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price, kind of odd how they work with the hard side of the paper.
customer_reviews.author: JBS

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Very effective at cleaning my nose. I wish It would smell differently but overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Julio y Ana

customer_reviews.title: Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: they work just like the name brand but wayyyy less expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Stormvision

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: These work alright, but tend to leave a sticky residue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was exactly what I had expected, 2 thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: JUST LIKE EXPENSIVE PORE STRIPS!!
customer_reviews.text: I was about to purchase some expensive pore strips when I saw these contained twice as many for the same price. To my surprise, they work just as well as any expensive strips I've ever tried. They feel identical to the strips I've used before, and they pulled tons of blackheads from my nose. This box will last me a while (since there are 24 in the box!!!) but I will definitely be ordering more once I'm out. This is one of those great finds where the generic/cheaper version is a great deal and just as good as the name brand/expensive version!
customer_reviews.author: LindseyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Better than the name brand!
customer_reviews.text: These strips work better than the more expensive one I have tried. They stick to my nose better and remove more blackheads in the process.
customer_reviews.author: DDou

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as the high end brands
customer_reviews.text: I love these strips and they are a great value! they can be a bit stiff but if you wet them a little on top they work perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Abby516

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked so well even my boyfriend is using them now
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Briggi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as good as Biore strips, at a fraction of the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Sloane D

customer_reviews.title: These do not work
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to purchase nose pore strips for awhile but the name brands are so expensive. These had somewhat decent reviews and were decently priced. They don't really do anything. I have large pores and get a lot of blackheads on my nose so I was expecting a lot of stuff to come off on the strip. I was very disappointed. I should have splurged and got the expensive ones!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Surprised by the results!
customer_reviews.text: I'm surprised with the outcome of these pore strips! I made a comparison video between them the Biore ones and they were pretty close! You can fine the video on YouTube: Memory Lane pore strip
customer_reviews.author: Winter Family

customer_reviews.title: Tore part of my nose off!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't do it. I've used plenty of the Loreal and Target Brand nose strips, these ones felt more like a wax strip!!! Took off a piece of my nose along with the few pores it actually removed. Not worth the cheap price--pay more for quality!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Marie

customer_reviews.title: This is a pretty good deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good deal! I am not sure that it works as well as other name brand ones, but that is fine by me. I used these after a mask in order to get any remaining residue off and it worked pretty well.
customer_reviews.author: anniefontaine

customer_reviews.title: The results were not what I desired.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the instructions exactly as they are written on the box, and left the strips on for the recommended 15 minutes. I've used the strips twice in the past week, and both times the results were not what I desired.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie H

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say except that they worked! I was surprised to see how much came off my nose! Sort of a weird smell, but I kind of expect that since it is a form of glue?
customer_reviews.author: Justin

product_meta.title: MEDca Deep Cleansing Nose Pore Strips, 24 Count (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Why is MEDca Deep nose pore Cleanser an optimal choice? 

 Exceptional Cleansing Ability 

 Say goodbye to the abhorrent blackheads with the new MEDca deep cleansing nose pore strips. This strip works like a powerful magnet and pulls out blackheads right from the roots. The nose pore strips are proved to be twice as strong as the leading pore cleanser at deep cleaning the nose pores. 

 Perfect Combination of Ingredients 

 With all essential ingredients of superior quality, MEDca strips are the best nose pore cleanser for you. The strips unclog pores by extracting dirt and oil from the pores to prevent blackhead formation, leaving your skin fresh and clean. 

 Safe and Convenient 

 You have a sensitive skin? Don’t worry! Our strips are dermatologist approved. These are hypoallergenic and safe even for those with the most sensitive skin. They won't cause any sort of irritation or damage to your skin. 

 Instant Result 

 You will feel the difference after just one use. Our nose pore strips are known for their instant result. Not only they remove blackheads, but also change the appearance of pores when used regularly. They are the permanent solution to remove hollow pores. 

 Key Features 

 Deep pore cleansing 
Instant blackhead removal 
Hypoallergenic 
Easy-to-use 
Pack of 24 

 Best value 

 We are offering this MEDca deep cleansing nose pore strip pack of 24 at discounted rate only for limited period of time. Get yours before the offer disappears! 

Make your purchase today to take advantage of the awesome offer by just clicking the Add to Cart button above.
feature_bullets: SUPERIOR NOSE PORE CLEANSER: Our new nose pore strips are unique and twice as effective as the leading pore cleanser at removing oil, dirt and blackheads.

PREMIUM INGREDIENTS: The strips are made of genuine and precise grade materials, which include aqua, balanced amount of titanium dioxide, and other superior ingredients. These are hypoallergenic and suit all skin types.
EASY TO USE: These strips are profoundly easy to use. All you need to do is unwrap and apply. It's also easy to remove as our strip has right amount of adhesive unlike in others.

PERMANENT BLACKHEAD REMOVAL: Our deep cleansing strip is the ultimate and permanent blackhead remover. The nose cleansing pore strip battles blackheads with magnet-like power and pulls out dirt from deep-down for the deepest cleaning possible.
PACK OF 24 STRIPS: This package consists of 24 nose pore strips wrapped individually for convenience.
